name: Barcelona Getaway 3 Nights
description: Start and end in Barcelona! With the discovery tour Barcelona Getaway 3 Nights, you have a 4 day tour package taking you through Barcelona, Spain. Barcelona Getaway 3 Nights is a small group tour that includes accommodation as well as an expert guide, meals.

name: 4 Days, 3 Nights Masai Mara And Lake Nakuru National Park Group Joining Safari
description: Start and end in Nairobi! With the safari tour 4 Days, 3 Nights Masai Mara And Lake Nakuru National Park Group Joining Safari, you have a 4 day tour package taking you through Nairobi, Kenya and 2 other destinations in Kenya. 4 Days, 3 Nights Masai Mara And Lake Nakuru National Park Group Joining Safari is a small group tour that includes accommodation as well as an expert guide, meals, transport and more.
